name: Married filers at high income in Zug (low-tax canton)
description: Married couple with combined income of CHF 150,000 in Zug, the lowest-tax canton

sources.description: Zug is known for having Switzerland's lowest tax rates, effective rate ~18-20% for this profile
sources.notes: Zug combined federal+cantonal typically 9-12% for married high earners, plus social 6.4%
